title: Quinoa and bulgur wheat salad with lemon and pomegranate
description: This zesty salad is packed full of flavour and goodness, perfect for popping in your lunchbox.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz red quinoa, rinsed well and drained
200g/7oz sun-blushed tomatoes in oil, drained and halved
2 tbsp freshly chopped fresh mint leaves
1 unwaxed lemon, finely grated zest and juice only
